code: import i18n from'i18next';import HttpApi from'i18next-http-backend';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';i18n.use(HttpApi).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({supportedLngs:['en','bd'],fallbackLng:'en',ns:['common','home'],interpolation:{escapeValue:false,formatSeparator:'.'},debug:false,detection:{order:['path','cookie','htmlTag'],caches:['cookie']},backend:{loadPath:'/locals/{{ns}}/{{lng}}.json'}});export default i18n;
